memberdef.name: TLE9563_LOG_RETURN

TLE9563_REG_BITF_VALUE
TLE9563_REG_MAP_HEX
memberdef.initializer: {\ tle9563_log.print("%s%s", TLE9563_REG_LOGGER_COLOR, TLE9563_REG_LOGGER_SERVICE);\ tle9563_log.print("%x :: 0x%02x\r\n", 0, map[0]);\ for(uint8_t i = 1; i < length; i++)\ {\ tle9563_log.print("%17x :: ", i);\ tle9563_log.print("0x%02x", map[i]);\ if(i == addr)\ tle9563_log.print("<---");\ \ tle9563_log.print("\r\n");\ }\ tle9563_log.print("%s", TLE9563_LOGGER_COLOR_DEFAULT);\ }
